item1.title: Cybersecurity Training that Tangibly Reduces Business Risk
item1.description: Our structured, hands-on cybersecurity training empowers professionals to better protect their organizations. With curated Career Paths, industry-aligned Certification Preparation Programs, and threat-informed training, we offer the best in the business.

item2.title: Security Awareness that Protects Your Organization from Cyber Threats
item2.description: Advanced security awareness programs equip employees with the knowledge and skills needed to recognize and respond to cyber threats. With continuously updated content and interactive training, we ensure comprehensive protection for your digital environment.

item3.title: Personal Protection that Safeguards Your Privacy and Digital Security
item3.description: Personal protection tools and tips designed specifically to protect your privacy and digital security. From password management to personal data protection, we provide practical solutions to keep you safe in the digital world.

incidentReport.title: Cybersecurity Incident Report
incidentReport.subtitle: Use this form to report any suspicious or confirmed cybersecurity incident. The report will be sent to decision makers for immediate review.
incidentReport.reportInformationDescription: Please fill in all required fields accurately to ensure prompt review

validationErrors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validationErrors.militaryNumberInvalid: Military number must contain only numbers
validationErrors.nationalNumberInvalid: National number must contain only numbers
validationErrors.phoneNumberInvalid: Phone number must contain only numbers

incidentReport.enterIncidentTitle: Enter a brief title for the incident
incidentReport.enterIncidentDescription: Describe the incident in detail, when it occurred, what symptoms were observed, and what actions have been taken so far...
incidentReport.successDescription: Your cybersecurity incident report has been sent to decision makers for review
incidentReport.errorDescription: An error occurred while submitting the report. Please try again
incidentReport.securityNote: All reports are protected and encrypted. Information will be handled with high sensitivity.
